author: rbb
msg: Fix the HTTPD release script.  It used to put log files in the tarball.
This change stops us from doing that.  all output gets logged to one file
which should be outside the tar'ed directory

author: rbb
msg: We don't really treat this field as a const, and currently we are getting
warnings because on line 536, we are trying to assign a non-const to a
const.  This started happening after a fix for Windows.  This change should
solve the problem on all systems.
